remove these lines too
Done
remove this too?
Done

Not really meta-open power specific change here right?
Better to split this commit into two.
1. Meta-phosphor: -> Restructuring deport scrips to bbclass.
2. Meta-openpower -> enablinf openpower-debug-collector specific changes.
Done
Probably shouldn't be "ibm" in meta-openpower?
Done
Overall, I suggest more use of whitespace (new lines) to make this more readable.  Right now it is just a wall of text.
Done
Wouldn't this be a path.join?
Done
path.join?
Done
Seems like more documentation could be provide in this for-loop.
Done
LGTM
Why did this end up needing to not be `os.path.join`?

these are two independent paths that do not need intelligent concatenation, rather need a simple concatenation.
I tried using os.path.join but it was ignoring the first string and causing wrong (partial) path to be stored in conf_dir and dreport_dir, causing issue.
Example: With (D + /usr/share/), expected output in this case is D/usr/share/ which cannot be achieved using os.path.join.
Ack.
